title: Positively Positive! [gl hf]
body:
Hey guys! A friend and I have made a club for the positive gamers on the rift! The club tag is gl hf  and the club name is Positively Positive! 
            {{sticker:vlad-salute}} 
If you aren't toxic and want to join us send me an add or message below! 

P.S
 Flame is lame!

replies.body: Can new players join? Sounds like fun!

> [{quoted}](name=Másk,realm=OCE,application-id=NjEElsTI,discussion-id=dthT4bfL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-25T06:02:49.583+0000)
>
> Can new players join? Sounds like fun!

The more the merrier :D send me an add!
I wanna join idk if this post still vaild
Can people still join? I sent you an invite but you didnt accept {{sticker:sg-janna}}

don't know if I'm too late I'd like to join too (unranked)
I only play lol for fun
IF you still want new members can i join?
Dont know if im late but sent you an add :)
Hi...I'm not sure if I'm too late but I would like to join! I play both mid and sup! I'm lvl 35 (unranked) and would love to be part of a club. Thank you! {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Flame is lame my doods. Just chucked you a friend request <3
